name: The eggoist
details: Fila classic, maci spicy salmon, two sushi salmon, two guargana salami

name: Makizushi
details: Fresh tuna, cucumber, or pickled daikon

name: California
details: California with salmon grill, fila with salmon,fila lollo mosa, lutomaki perch cheese, mali spicy salmon

name: Temaki
details: Fresh shiso leaf and umeboshi (pickled plum), negitoro, squid with and without natto, and sweetened omelet

name: Nigiri
details: Seafood, vegetables, meat, omelet, or tofu, and in addition to fresh seafood, the fish may be pickled in soy sauce or vinegar, or broiled with a blowtorch

name: Oshizushi
details: Fish like mackerel or gizzard shad, and may also be decoratively layered with edible leaves like bamboo
